definition[0]: to show respect and love for a god, especially by praying in a religious building
example[0]: They all worship the same god.
example[1]: a church where people have worshipped for hundreds of years
definition[1]: to admire and love someone very much
definition[2]: the activity of praying or singing in a religious building in order to show respect and love for a god
example[3]: The ceremony must take place in a recognized place of worship.
example[4]: We were invited to join in their act of worship  (=religious ceremony).
example[5]: They bowed their heads in worship.
example[6]: Worship of the old gods still continues in remote areas of the country.
